CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV briefly explains four boxes to MOT then leaves room
MOT is out of camera range . CHI stands in the middle of the room looking up
CHI walks over to where MOT is standing
MOT walks to the middle of the room and is visible from the waist down
CHI turns around following MOT to the middle of the room .
MOT sits down on the floor with the box in front of her
CHI kneels down on the floor in front of MOT
MOT and CHI face each other with the box between them . CHI back is to the camera
CHI pushes the box cover away
CHI holds the book up . CHI looks at the book then at MOT
CHI holds book out in direction of MOT
CHI back is to the camera
MOT looks down while holding book
CHI crawls over to MOT placing her hand on MOT lap
CHI sits back next to MOT while looking across the room
CHI looks across the room at something
MOT looks at CHI then nods her head in the direction of something out of camera range
CHI is seated next to MOT . CHI looks across room
CHI looks on as MOT reads
MOT moves book closer to CHI
MOT refers to the familiarity of the story
MOT puts the book into the box
CHI walks across the room . CHI reaches for a box
MOT covers the book box then puts it off to the side
CHI slides a new box off the table
CHI walks across the room towards MOT with the box
CHI puts the box on the floor between CHI and MOT
CHI looks down then reaches into the box
CHI takes a puppet out of the box
CHI reaches into the box for the other puppet . CHI holds puppet out to MOT
MOT puts the puppet on her hand
CHI puts puppet on her hand
CHI looks up in direction of MOT
MOT changes her voice as she plays with the puppet
MOT makes a noise like a parrot
MOT makes the noise of a parrot
CHI looks at her puppet then holds it up in front of her
<bef> CHI looks at her puppet . CHI touches the mouthpiece of her puppet then the puppets eyes
MOT uses a different voice when using the puppet
MOT moves her puppet towards CHI then back again
CHI looks at MOT puppet then at puppet on CHI hand . CHI holds her puppet out towards MOT then pulls it back
MOT pulls her puppet back away from CHI puppet
MOT holds her puppet upright next to her as she watches CHI
CHI moves her puppets eyes around
CHI holds her puppet up to her face so they are eye to eye then turns the puppet in the direction of MOT
<bef> MOT leans forward closer to CHI
MOT moves her puppet closer to CHI
CHI looks at her puppet touching the eyes
CHI holds her puppet up then down quickly . CHI looks down into her lap
CHI slides the puppet off of her hand into the box on the floor in front of her
CHI looks down then around the floor
MOT takes her puppet off placing it in the box
MOT points in the direction of the box cover next to CHI
<aft> CHI reaches for the box cover as she looks up at something across the room
CHI puts the cover on the box then stands up
MOT moves the book box off to the side
CHI walks across the room then reaches for another box on the table . CHI turns around with the box walking towards MOT
CHI spills contents of box onto the floor as she walks across the room
MOT leans forward holding out her hands
CHI holds up one half of the box in her hands as she looks down at the stuff that fell
MOT picks up the half of the box that fell then turns it over
CHI kneels down in front of MOT then reaches into the box with paper in it
MOT puts a piece of paper on the other half of the box
MOT slides the box over so it is in front of CHI
CHI back is to the camera
CHI leans forward then takes a piece of paper out of the box . CHI drops paper on the floor next to her then leans back
MOT refers to crayons CHI is holding in her hand but are not visible to the camera
<bef> MOT moves half of the box away to make room for CHI
MOT touches the rug beside her to motion CHI to sit beside her
CHI leans forward picking up the piece of paper she dropped earlier . CHI gets up on her knees facing MOT
<bef> MOT moves the box with the paper on it to the space in front of her
MOT pats the floor next to her to direct CHI . MOT reaches for the paper CHI is holding then puts it inside the empty half of the box beside her
CHI kneels in front of MOT then holds up a crayon
MOT motions to CHI to come sit beside her
CHI walks across the floor on her knees then sits down next to MOT
CHI is now visible sideview to the camera
CHI looks up at MOT holding up a crayon
MOT holds paper in place for CHI
<bef> CHI leans back away from her drawing looking down
CHI points at the drawing then at her head with a crayon . CHI looks up at MOT
MOT head is not visible . MOT moves her hand to her chin as she tries to figure out what CHI means
CHI looks down at the crayons she holds in her lap
CHI holds out crayons for MOT
MOT takes a crayon from CHI
MOT moves the paper closer to CHI making a gesture with her crayon where the fruit would be drawn
MOT puts her crayon down on the floor beside her
CHI stops coloring then leans back
CHI leans back then looks up at MOT
CHI reaches for a different crayon
CHI colors with one crayon then switches colors again
CHI leans back looking down at her drawing
CHI picks up another crayon . CHI colors
MOT points then moves her finger around on the paper to outline the size of the hat
MOT looks off to her side
CHI reaches out with her hand touching the box in front of her then she puts her hand down by her side
MOT picks up another piece of paper then puts it back down on the floor
CHI looks up at MOT then back down again
CHI picks up a crayon off of the floor
CHI points as she picks up a crayon off the floor
MOT reaches for a crayon on the floor in front of CHI
CHI starts to point with the crayon then ends up pointing with her other hand
MOT looks at CHI then down at drawing
CHI sits back looking down at MOT coloring
MOT sings at the end of this sentence
CHI nods head yes . CHI looks down
MOT holds crayon out towards CHI
MOT points with the crayon then holds it out to CHI again
CHI leans back as she looks down
CHI looks around as she speaks
MOT switches the drawing for a clean piece of paper . MOT puts the drawing off to the side on the floor as she places the clean sheet on the box in front of CHI
CHI points with the crayon on the paper
CHI leans forward pointing at something out of camera range
MOT gestures to herself then to CHI
<bef> CHI looks down holding out a crayon in the direction of MOT
CHI picks up a crayon off the floor
CHI holds the crayon out to MOT
CHI looks up then stands up
MOT picks up the crayons and paper then puts them in the box
<bef> CHI runs across the room then reaches for another box . CHI turns with a new box in her hands then drops it on the floor
MOT leans forward with her arms outstretched
MOT finishes putting crayons and paper away
CHI pulls the play house out of the box
CHI leans forward looking into the box
MOT lifts the empty box house was in moving it off to the side
CHI sits on the floor with her back to the camera and the house in front of her
CHI leans forward looking into the house with her back to the camera
MOT picks up the house moving it into camera range
CHI crawls over to where MOT has placed the house . CHI turns to look back over her shoulder at something then turns towards the house again
MOT is seated behind the house . MOT leans over the house to watch CHI
CHI kneels in front of the house
CHI gets up on her knees trying to open up the house
MOT moves the handle on top of the house
CHI leans back looking into the house
MOT leans forward to look into the house then leans back again
CHI reaches into the house removing toy person and furniture
MOT leans forward on both arms . MOT looks into the house
CHI leans closer to the house looking in
MOT leans over the house then looks up at CHI
CHI takes another toy person out of the house . CHI plays with toy people
MOT is still seated behind the house
CHI plays with toy in her hand
CHI puts toy furniture on the floor
CHI reaches into the house pulling out another piece of furniture
MOT moves closer to the house
MOT moves the house a bit
CHI plays as if the toy people were speaking
CHI bangs a toy on the floor
MOT leans forward looking into the house
MOT grabs both ends of the house pushing it up so she can see inside
MOT leans back letting go of the house . MOT looks at CHI
CHI reaches into the garage pulling out the toy car
CHI bangs something on the rug then plays with the toys
MOT seems to be explaining situation to EXP behind camera
CHI looks around on the floor then up at MOT
CHI seems to be talking to the toy people . CHI blocks the objects she is playing with from the camera
MOT shrugs then gestures with one hand towards something on the floor
CHI makes whining sound at the toy people
MOT reaches for a toy then repositions it on the floor in front of CHI
<bef> CHI puts the toy into the car seat
CHI barks at the toy people seated at table
CHI holds toy dog over toy people seated at table
CHI speaks to other toys through the toy dog
CHI bangs toy dog into the car
CHI back is to camera blocking full view of her actions
MOT leans back away from CHI
CHI looks up at MOT briefly
MOT gestures with her hand for CHI to turn around
MOT wants CHI to move so CHI is not blocking her actions from the camera
CHI has moved so her actions are now fully visible
CHI makes whining sound at toy people
CHI shakes dog at toy people
CHI looks up at MOT then down at the floor
CHI leans forward holding the toy in her hand
<bef> CHI removes toy person from a chair replacing it with the toy dog
MOT sits back watching CHI play
CHI picks up a toy person
CHI makes a whining noise at toys
CHI speaks to other toys through toy person
CHI looks down holding toy person over other toys seated at toy table
CHI moves toys closer to the toy table
CHI speaks to the toys as she arranges them around the toy table
CHI makes whining sound at toys
CHI leans back holding a toy then leans forward
CHI rearranges the toys around the table
<bef> CHI leans back shaking the toy in the air then leans forward to reposition a toy at the table
MOT leans forward over the house . Mot looks into the house then leans back again
CHI lays down on the floor in front of the house . CHI looks into the house
CHI lays on the floor playing with a toy person
CHI speaks to the other toys through the toy she holds in her hand
CHI moves the toy up and down
MOT is sitting behind the house . MOT head is not visible
CHI moves the toy closer to the toys seated around the table
CHI lays on the floor playing with the toy
<$/=3> CHI holds a toy behind chair of another toy seated at the table
CHI speaks to other toys through toy she holds
CHI moves toy back in the air then returns it to its position behind the chair of another toy
CHI taps one toy with another toy
MOT head is not visible as she leans back away from CHI
CHI moves onto her stomach then looks behind her . CHI gets up on her knees turning her back to MOT
<bef> CHI drops toy into the box then closes the top of the box
CHI turns around in the direction of MOT . CHI looks over in direction of MOT then looks at the box
MOT is out of camera range . MOT continues pretend play situation with CHI
CHI looks up in direction of MOT while kneeling beside the box
CHI looks down then to the side in the direction of the box
CHI looks down then in the direction of MOT
CHI looks up then quickly turns to look behind her
MOT picks up a toy then holds it out toward CHI
MOT moves toy toward CHI . MOT plays as if toy is walking
MOT leans back with the toy
MOT gestures with her hand for CHI to move box closer
MOT pretends her toy is speaking
<bef> MOT scales the side of the box with the toy then taps the toy on top of the box
CHI kneels on the floor behind the box . CHI watches MOT
<aft> MOT holds toy up in the air over the box
CHI sits back on her heels with both hands on top of the box
<bef> MOT taps the box with the toy
MOT holds toy down by her side
CHI moves one box flap as if box were speaking
CHI hits the top of the box with one hand
MOT holds toy over the box
CHI moves box lid as if it were speaking
MOT holds toy over the box
CHI moves box lid as if it were speaking
MOT places the toy in a chair by the toy table
<bef> CHI bends down picking up another toy
CHI holds toy up towards MOT then looks over her shoulder
